title: mri_glmfit-sim
description: A tool to run corrections for multiple comparisons on volumes or surfaces, using various methods including Monte Carlo simulation, permutation, and Gaussian Random Fields.

sig_voxel_mgh.title: Corrected Sig Voxel
sig_voxel_mgh.description: Sig volume corrected for voxel-wise multiple comparisons.

sig_cluster_mgh.title: Corrected Sig Cluster
sig_cluster_mgh.description: Sig volume corrected for cluster-wise multiple comparisons.

y_ocn_dat.title: Y OCN Data
y_ocn_dat.description: Summary of the input (y) over each cluster.

sig_masked_mgh.title: Masked Sig Volume
sig_masked_mgh.description: Original sig volume masked to show only clusters.
